about.summary: A tool for Hierarchical Climate Regionalization applicable to any correlation-based clustering. It adds several features and a new clustering method (called, 'regional' linkage) to hierarchical clustering in R ('hclust' function in 'stats' library): data regridding, coarsening spatial resolution, geographic masking, contiguity-constrained clustering, data filtering by mean and/or variance thresholds, data preprocessing (detrending, standardization, and PCA), faster correlation function with preliminary big data support, different clustering methods, hybrid hierarchical clustering, multivariate clustering (MVC), cluster validation, visualization of regionalization results, and exporting region map and mean timeseries into NetCDF-4 file.

name: r-hiclimr
raw_recipe:
{% set version = '2.1.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-hiclimr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/HiClimR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/HiClimR/HiClimR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f58d2a2799d004e3804cc1af4e8a065235ba54677f243362bc6bb42a58f1ddfa

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}  # [win]
    - {{posix}}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{posix}}make
    - {{posix}}sed               # [win]
    - {{posix}}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ncdf4
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-ncdf4

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('HiClimR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('HiClimR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/hsbadr/HiClimR
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: 'A tool for Hierarchical Climate Regionalization applicable to any correlation-based
    clustering. It adds several features and a new clustering method (called, ''regional''
    linkage) to hierarchical clustering in R (''hclust'' function in ''stats'' library):
    data regridding, coarsening spatial resolution, geographic masking, contiguity-constrained
    clustering, data filtering by mean and/or variance thresholds, data preprocessing
    (detrending, standardization, and PCA), faster correlation function with preliminary
    big data support, different clustering methods, hybrid hierarchical clustering,
    multivariate clustering (MVC), cluster validation, visualization of regionalization
    results, and exporting region map and mean timeseries into NetCDF-4 file.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - PertuyF

# Package: HiClimR
# Version: 2.1.4
# Title: Hierarchical Climate Regionalization
# Author: Hamada S. Badr [aut, cre], Benjamin F. Zaitchik [aut], Amin K. Dezfuli [aut]
# Description: A tool for Hierarchical Climate Regionalization applicable to any correlation-based clustering. It adds several features and a new clustering method (called, 'regional' linkage) to hierarchical clustering in R ('hclust' function in 'stats' library): data regridding, coarsening spatial resolution, geographic masking, contiguity-constrained clustering, data filtering by mean and/or variance thresholds, data preprocessing (detrending, standardization, and PCA), faster correlation function with preliminary big data support, different clustering methods, hybrid hierarchical clustering, multivariate clustering (MVC), cluster validation, visualization of regionalization results, and exporting region map and mean timeseries into NetCDF-4 file.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: https://github.com/hsbadr/HiClimR
# BugReports: https://github.com/hsbadr/HiClimR/issues
# Maintainer: Hamada S. Badr <badr@jhu.edu>
# Depends: R (>= 2.10)
# Imports: graphics, grDevices, stats, utils, ncdf4
# Suggests: devtools, knitr, rmarkdown, roxygen2
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# LazyData: yes
# LazyLoad: yes
# ByteCompile: yes
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# SystemRequirements: NetCDF (>= 4.1)
# Packaged: 2019-01-20 20:11:51 UTC; hbadr1
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-01-20 20:40:02 UTC

about.summary: A tool for Hierarchical Climate Regionalization applicable to any correlation-based clustering. It adds several features and a new clustering method (called, 'regional' linkage) to hierarchical clustering in R ('hclust' function in 'stats' library): data regridding, coarsening spatial resolution, geographic masking, contiguity-constrained clustering, data filtering by mean and/or variance thresholds, data preprocessing (detrending, standardization, and PCA), faster correlation function with preliminary big data support, different clustering methods, hybrid hierarchical clustering, multivariate clustering (MVC), cluster validation, visualization of regionalization results, and exporting region map and mean timeseries into NetCDF-4 file.
